name: Fort Awesome
description: Fort Awesome is a virtual reality game for people who like to build forts in their living room, or make tree houses, or just want a comfortable place to asynchronous Co-Op play with a friend!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1080 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
